alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and northwestern Herkimer Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Big Moose, or 15 miles northwest of Old Forge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nehasane, Little Rapids, Beaver River, Partlow, Robinwood, Moshier Falls, Keepawa, Brandreth, Lyon Lake, Lake Lila and Woods Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
